name: Tesco Rhubarb Crumble 500G
description: Rhubarb Crumble with a Crumble Topping
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="Fan 160°C" G="Gas 4" C="180°C" /><Time>35-40 minutes</Time><Instructions>For best results cook from frozen.1) Preheat the oven to 180C/Fan 160C/Gas Mark 42) Remove all outer packaging and film lid3) Carefully fork the crumble topping so it is evenly distributed4) Please on a baking tray in the centre of the oven and cook for 35-40 minutes</Instructions></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Cooking_Precautions>All appliances vary these are guidelines only.Check food is piping hot throughout before serving.</Cooking_Precautions></Cooking_Instructions><Freezing_Instructions><Freezing_Guidelines>Keep Frozen at -18°C or cooler.Important: If food has thawed, do not refreeze.</Freezing_Guidelines></Freezing_Instructions><Recipes>Name of recipe suggestionIngredients:Method:To Serve:</Recipes><Serving_Suggestions>4</Serving_Suggestions>
ingredients: Wheat Flour (Wheat Flour, Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin)
PromotionDescription: Save 45p on any Tesco frozen apple crumble
